content: What happened at approximately 2022-06-12T17:00:00+01:00 that seems to have reset the "last modified" time of almost every open PR? Screenshot-2022-06-13-at-19.05.34.png
Alt text: A screenshot of the last page of the list of all open PRs, sorted by most recently updated. Apart from the last two, all PRs are listed as "updated 22 hours ago".
We noticed this. There was a force push to master which is probably the explanation.
